named-query.name: getProcessInstances
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log ORDER BY log.processId, log.start

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states)

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByDeploymentId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.externalId=:externalId and log.status in (:states)

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessDefinition
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.processId =:processDefId

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceById
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processId

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessIdAndStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processId like :processId

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessIdAndStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processId like :processId and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessNameAndStatus
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processName like :processName

named-query.name: getProcessInstancesByProcessNameAndStatusAndInitiator
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.ProcessInstanceDesc( log.processInstanceId, log.processId, log.processName, log.processVersion, log.status, log.externalId, log.start, log.identity, log.processInstanceDescription ) from ProcessInstanceLog log where log.status in (:states) and log.processName like :processName and log.identity = :initiator

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceFullHistory
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId=:processId ORDER BY log.date DESC, log.id DESC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceFullHistoryByType
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId=:processId AND log.type=:type ORDER BY log.date DESC, log.id DESC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceActiveNodes
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.nodeInstanceId in ( select nil.nodeInstanceId from NodeInstanceLog nil where nil.processInstanceId=:processId GROUP BY nil.nodeInstanceId HAVING sum(nil.type) = 0) and log.type = 0 and log.processInstanceId=:processId order by log.id ASC

named-query.name: getProcessInstanceCompletedNodes
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.nodeInstanceId in (select nodeInstanceId from NodeInstanceLog nid where nid.processInstanceId=:processId AND nid.type = 1 GROUP BY nid.nodeInstanceId HAVING sum(nid.type) >= 1) and log.type = 1 and log.processInstanceId=:processId ORDER BY log.date ASC

named-query.name: getNodeInstanceForWorkItem
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.NodeInstanceDesc( log.nodeInstanceId, log.nodeId, log.nodeName, log.nodeType, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date, log.connection, log.type, log.workItemId ) from NodeInstanceLog log where log.workItemId=:workItemId and log.type = 0 ORDER BY log.nodeInstanceId, log.id ASC

named-query.name: getVariablesCurrentState
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.VariableStateDesc( log.variableId, log.variableInstanceId, log.oldValue, log.value, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date ) from VariableInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId AND log.id in (select max(vss.id) FROM VariableInstanceLog vss WHERE vss.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId group by vss.variableId ) order by log.id

named-query.name: getVariableHistory
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.VariableStateDesc( log.variableId, log.variableInstanceId, log.oldValue, log.value, log.externalId, log.processInstanceId, log.date ) from VariableInstanceLog log where log.processInstanceId =:processInstanceId AND log.variableId =:variableId order by log.id DESC

named-query.name: getTaskInstanceById
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.UserTaskInstanceDesc( a.taskId, a.status, a.activationTime, a.name, a.description, a.priority, a.actualOwner, a.createdBy, a.deploymentId, a.processId, a.processInstanceId, a.createdOn, a.dueDate ) from AuditTaskImpl a where a.taskId = :taskId

named-query.name: getTaskInstanceByWorkItemId
named-query.query: select new org.jbpm.kie.services.impl.model.UserTaskInstanceDesc( a.taskId, a.status, a.activationTime, a.name, a.description, a.priority, a.actualOwner, a.createdBy, a.deploymentId, a.processId, a.processInstanceId, a.createdOn, a.dueDate ) from AuditTaskImpl a, TaskImpl t where a.taskId = t.id and t.taskData.workItemId = :workItemId
